import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useApp}from'../contexts/AppContext';import{taskAPI}from'../services/api';import TodayScreen from'./TodayScreen';import MonthScreen from'./MonthScreen';import ProfileScreen from'./ProfileScreen';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StudentApp=()=>{const{user,systemDate,setSystemDateSafely,advanceDay,resetToInitialDate,canSetDate,initialDate}=useApp();const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState('当日任务');const[reminderShown,setReminderShown]=useState(false);const[alertVisible,setAlertVisible]=useState(false);// 手动触发24:00任务处理

• 根据数量进行结转或顺延
